title: Sophie's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Trendy cafe with focus on wholefood, local and organic produce. Est. 2013.  Many vegetarian items, including mains, salads, dips. Also offers healthy a la carte breakfast menu as well as organic fair trade tea and coffee, made-to-order fresh juices, wheatgrass shots, smoothies with almond milk, and has a tofu scramble.
streetAddress: Lower Ground Floor, RIVA Beach Club, Building 8, Shoreline Apartments, Palm Jumeirah
